title: Purchase a $50 eSIM credit for just $18.97 through October 31st!
content:
Macworld

Long-distance communication is easier than ever in the digital age — except, it seems, when you’re traveling abroad. Traveling this holiday and want to avoid expensive roaming charges? Then aloSIM is a must-have, especially since it comes with $50 of credit for under $19 through October. This could be an excellent gift for loved ones who enjoy traveling!

aloSIM (4.5 out of 5 stars on the App Store!) is a digital eSIM that makes it easy to stay connected without incurring any expensive roaming charges. Just set up your account before traveling, indicate what country you’ll be going to (check aloSIM’s list to ensure your country is included), and enjoy unencumbered access to that country’s domestic data networks once you arrive.

This eSIM is widely compatible with mobile devices like iPhones and iPads, as well as computers. And since 7-day data packages start at just $4.50, it’s a more economical way to get data access from international destinations. 

Keep in mind that your data plan will expire at the end of the valid period, even if you don’t use up all the data. However, your actual aloSIM eSIM will not expire.

Give the gift of affordable international data to a loved one when you get the aloSIM eSIM with $50 of data credits for just $18.97. No coupon is necessary, but this deal ends October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific!
